WorkItem.ClosedComment: Please read the Documentation on the Enforce Gem Requirements checkbox
WorkItem.Description:
With rawr 2.3.9 the chaotic skyflare diamond is still activ without gemming one or two blue sockets or nightmare tear. 
But this Meta chaotic skyflare diamond requires at least 2 Blue gems.
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=41285
 
Also the relentless earthsiege diamond
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=41398
Without gemming a nightmare tear or any else blue gems, its still active in rawr
 
2nd problem, the optimizer sets automaticly the meta chaotic skyflare diamond. But the relentless earthsiege diamond is better for dps warriors
Module: dps warrior
WorkItem.Summary: rawr 2.3.9 chaotic skyflare diamond still active

Comments.Message: Attach the character xml where this happens. Beyond that make sure to select Enforce Gem Requirements and there's no reason to mark Chaotic Skyflare Diamond as available.
